ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai built a simulation accessible through a projection pool. During the first practical test, three Nomai became trapped inside the projection.
A Nomai named Calad noted that the three projection anchors act together to stabilize the area between them and that a projection stone was likely to be found there.
There is a passageway in the floor leading downwards. A Nomai named Primm noted that Projection Anchor 1 was located between the passage and the projection pool entrance.
I found a Stranger-styled area below the Nomai structures.

A Nomai named Calad believed a projection stone would be found in the same position on the underside as the entrance is on the top side. A Nomai named Primm was unsure how to find that location without some sort of marker.
I found a projection stone that will allow me to escape the projection.
The Nomai concluded they wouldn't finish this project, as they considered it to go against Nomai philosophy.
